author: brane
msg: Replicate r1641161 for the svn-sparc-solaris buildslave.
Only tell configure to --enable-optimize when building

author: brock
msg: HIVE-8707 - Fix ordering differences due to Java 8 HashMap function (Mohit Sabharwal via Brock)

author: brane
msg: On second thoughts, just don't use --enable-optimize with 1.8.x builds
on the macosx build slave. Without the option, we still get the
default -O2; with that option, we get -O0, which I consider horrible.
Only tell configure to --enable-optimize when we're building

author: rgardler
msg: Updte MOTD to latest release version, Feb 2011 was quite some time ago :-)

author: brane
msg: Fix the macosx slave to make tests work on the 1.8 branch.
Add --disable-optimize to configure options when building 1.8.x.
